page.title: 04LANDSCAPE AROUND W.BERGHOLT
page.content: VIEW FROM THE NORTHERN BOUNDARY OF OUR DOMESDAY BLOCK. RIGHT IN FRONT OF ME I CAN SEE A HAY HARVEST FIELD,FURTHER ON THERE IS HILL HOUSE WOOD WITH FRESH GREEN TREES,AND FURTHER THAN THAT THERE ARE ROLLING GREEN HILLS, AND ON THE TOP IN THE DISTANCE ARE SOME TREES.TO THE OTHER SIDE OF ME IS WEST BERGHOLT HALL AND THE OLD CHURCH. THE OTHER SIDE OF ME IS SPRING WOOD WITH LOTS OF SHADES OF GREEN ABOUT.ALSO ON THE LEFT IS COOK'S HALL,THE COLNE VALLEY AND EIGHT ASH GREEN.THE SUN IS OUT AND A SUDDEN BREEZY WIND IS HOWLING.THE BLACK CLOUDS ARE ROLLING UP THE RIVER VALLEY-IT IS SUDDENLY COLD-RAIN.AROUND ME ARE LOTS OF ARABLE AND DAIRY FARMS, TREES,WOODS,FIELDS AND FOOTPATHS.THERE ARE ALSO A LOT OF VARIETIES OF GRASSES AND WILD FLOWERS.THERE ARE A LOT OF COWS AND SHEEP AROUND.
